SELECT TOP(1) [u].[ID], [u].[CreatedAt], [u].[CreatedBy], [u].[Email], [u].[FirstName], [u].[IsDeleted], [u].[IsLocked], [u].[LastName], [u].[MobileNumber], [u].[ModifiedAt], [u].[ModifiedBy], [u].[ParentUserID], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PasswordSalt], [u].[Path], [u].[RoleID], [u].[RowVersion], [u].[Status], [u].[Token], [r].[ID], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[IsDeleted], [r].[ModifiedAt], [r].[ModifiedBy], [r].[Name], [r].[Status], [r].[StoreID]
FROM [User] AS [u]

WHERE [u].[MobileNumber] = @__loginDto_MobileNumber_0
